ComicInfo.Summary:
Liz Sherman relives the fate of an accused woman who was tortured three hundred years ago, but she has to rein in her own fire power, or an entire New England town will be forced to relive the day when Liz burned her own family to death.
Liz’s first mission comes to a horrifying end, presenting the details of her parents’ death for the first time!
https://comicvine.gamespot.com/bprd-the-dead-remembered-3-3-of-3/4000-272474/
ComicInfo.Teams: Bureau for Paranormal Research and Defense
ComicInfo.Title: The Dead Remembered
